name: Registered Mail Option (INTERNATIONAL BUYERS ONLY)
description:
For added security to your international shipment, purchase this registered mail option along with your Item. This is the USPS charge for the international mail registered service.

This is only an option and not required. But please note, I will not be held responsible for missing or lost items if the item has been sent to the correct address. Feel free to take advantage should you want a little added security.

â€¢ Once I receive confirmation of your completed payment your item will be sent within 2 business days. Once your item is sent I will send you an E-mail with your tracking number. 

Thank you!
